original_text: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord his God, and humbled not himself before Jeremiah the prophet speaking from the mouth of the Lord.
korean_text: 그의 하나님 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하고 선지자 예레미야가 여호와의 말씀으로 일러도 그 앞에서 겸손하지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: And he did that which was evil
in the sight of the Lord his God
speaking from the mouth of the Lord
